# GRAPHICS::RESET_ADAPTATION

## Summary
Reset the PostFX adaptation

## Parameters
* **INT** numFrames = 6: Default number of frames to reset for is 1

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets an value related to timecycles.
